title: was told players cannot be banned under certain conditions
body: so i just got through a game of league(trying to bring back {{champion:75}} jungle) and had a very rude yasuo on the other team. they won but he felt the need to end the match with gg losers. when he was informed of his report he responded with,(i cant be banned i have over 300 honar, honared players cant be banned) well i assume this to be nonsence, i must ask if it is true as ive reported players that were incredably toxic to the point of being reacist and seen them in matches again in the same week.

replies.body: Honor won't affect your reports. Reports can affect your honor though.

Nope, that's not true. If you are being toxic Riot will banned you with no fuck to give.


Sincerely,
http://www.auplod.com/u/auopld60eff.png
thank goodness for that. i mean i was aving fun as nasus. and he had to be mean.
